EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Information (1314026041.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Jake,
It was a pleasure speaking with you today, and thank you again for your interest in MBO Partners. I have attached some useful information about MBO as discussed. For more details regarding our benefits, please visit http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-exec-group-benefits
Do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions and I’ll be happy to help! Best Regards, Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
